LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueDoctorHelmet.label: Plague Doctor Mask
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueDoctorHelmet.description: The mask has glass eye openings and a beak shaped nose, typically stuffed with herbs, straw, and spices.

LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueDoctorHood.description: The mask has glass eye openings and a beak shaped nose, typically stuffed with herbs, straw, and spices.
